name: Invalid Operation - Get Email or SMS OTP
fullName: QA|Nova Bank - Infopool/Bank User/v1/Auth/MFA/Request#Invalid Operation - Get Email or SMS OTP
description:
Get Email or SMS OTP. For OTP, you need to provide either `email` or `phone` if you are not logged in.
    `operation` can be one of: 
- LOGIN
- FORGOT_PASSWORD
- CREATE_ROLE
- UPDATE_ROLE
- DELETE_ROLE
descriptionHtml:
Get Email or SMS OTP. For OTP, you need to provide either `email` or `phone` if you are not logged in.
`operation` can be one of:
- LOGIN
- FORGOT_PASSWORD
- CREATE_ROLE
- UPDATE_ROLE
- DELETE_ROLE
